Title: How to Make Decisions You Won’t Regret in Business
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       The irony of Zoom asking their employees to come back to the office

•       How to help a co-worker who is struggling to be self-aware and it’s hurting their career

•       What to do when purchasing a business from your aging parents 

•       How to make sure you have the right people around when your business is booming
